cause.description:
We believe that all aspiring dancers should be able to dance and attend proper classes to progress as dancers in there future.
1. Dance is a passionate hobby and life style.
2. These dancers need and opportunity to progress toward their future.
3. Dance can make their lives better and help them have a happy life.
cause.mission: allow dancers who can't afford to pay for a proper dance education to be able to attend proper dance classes.
cause.name: Dance Dreams
